result.reason: Already fixed — PuttyBase.OnPowerModeChanged calls Resize on power resume, and frmMain dispatches PowerModeChanged to all active connections
result.approach: No action needed — the fix is already in place (PuttyBase.OnPowerModeChanged triggers Resize on Resume, frmMain.OnPowerModeChanged iterates all open connections)

attempts.raw_output:
This issue has already been fixed. The code at `PuttyBase.cs:731-737` handles `OnPowerModeChanged` by calling `Resize()` on resume from hibernate/suspend. The `frmMain.cs:598-616` subscribes to `SystemEvents.PowerModeChanged` and dispatches the event to all active protocol connections.
